Title: Relates to prohibiting the disclosure and publication of the home address or unpublished home telephone number of any active or retired judge or prosecutor
Summary: Prohibits the disclosure and publication of the home address or unpublished home telephone number of any active or retired judge or prosecutor.
LawCode: Amd §89, Pub Off L; add §§250.61 & 250.62, Pen L; add §50-h, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the penal law and the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting the disclosure and publication of the home address or unpublished home telephone number of any active or retired judge or prosecutor
